attributes.action: make Aliando king of the world!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being a direct decendent to God, I am your saviour.

Thou shalt worship me daily by placing oneself naked upon the roof of a snow-covered house.

Tony Blair will be my tea boy as he has proven himself inadequate at doing anything more serious such as not get into wars over oil or run a health service properly.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
